problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the diameter AB of the semicircle O is N_0, the edge length of ▱BCDE is DC, DE and the semicircle O are tangent to the points F and G respectively, and the side BC and the semicircle O intersect at the point H, connect GH, if GH ∥ AB, Then the area of ​​▱BCDE is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形DEBC是平行四边形,∴DE∥BC,∵GH∥AB,∴GH∥EB,∴四边形GEBH是平行四边形,连接OG、OF,OG交BC于M,∵CD,DE是⊙O的切线,∴OG⊥DE,OF⊥CD,∴OG⊥BC,∴BM=\frac{1}{2}BH=\frac{1}{2}EG,∵BM∥EG,∴△OBM∽△OEG,∴\frac{OB}{OE}=\frac{BM}{EG}=\frac{1}{2},∴OE=2OB=4,∴EB=2,∴S▱DEBC=EB•OF=2×2=4；故选:D．
